mdRecord.dcterms:title: Handwritten List of Officers and Privates of Floyd Riflemen
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time documents, handwritten list of Officers and Privates of “Floyd Riflemen,” undated; and handwritten list of food stuffs for Company A, 24th VA Infantry. 2 original pieces.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
